name: LoopIn
description:
We are Strange connection Team

  • Tom Chen Zion: https://tonotix.itch.io/
  • Moshe Paz: https://scarecrew.itch.io/
  • Dani Tufeld: https://danitufi.itch.io/
  • Yosi Saranga: https://playos.itch.io/ 

4 Students that enjoy developing games

  • This weekend we build a Game for the competition "LudumDare" 
  • The theme was "Stuck in a loop" 

Our Game: You play a baby octopus that is  stuck inside  a ship wreck made

 of moving ring platforms and your goal is to reach the treasure chest in the middle, by

 jumping from platform to platform and avoiding obstacles on the way. as you dive 

dipper in to the levels the way out of the maze becomes harder to solve. You have to 

be fast and remember, press SPACE to jump from platform to platform.

Made in Israel.
